title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Blended Education Course for Improving Elementary Language Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading and writing skills, with the ability to engage in simple daily conversations
context.additional_context: Designed for beginner learners to apply language skills in real-life contexts through simulation activities focused on everyday language use. Enhanced through personal device utilization and small-group interactions

learning_goals: Learners can use appropriate language expressions in three or more real-life situations (e.g., ordering, giving directions) with 80% accuracy through role-play simulations.
Learners can solve virtual language problems (e.g., travel reservations) with a 90% completion rate using digital simulation tools.
Learners can identify two or more areas for improvement by analyzing their own language speaking videos based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
